.. py:function:: landingPage(request)

   Landing page for the backend

   :param request: GET request
   :type request: HTTP GET
   :return: Rendered page
   :rtype: None

   Documentation page for the backend

   :param request: GET request
   :type request: HTTP GET
   :return: Rendered page
   :rtype: None
